metadata.title: CVE-2022-48968 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-pf: Fix potential memory leak in otx2_init_tc()In otx2_init_tc(), if rhashtable_init() failed, it does not freetc->tc_entries_bitmap which is allocated in otx2_tc_alloc_ent_bitmap().

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
